T02D1617:148b-0: @148b * // dpal gdan bzhi pa'i chu'i sbyin sreg bzhugs /
T02D1617:148b-2: # // bcom ldan 'das ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1617:148b-3: chu yi sbyin sreg rim pa zhig /'gro ba sems can don du ni //
T02D1617:148b-4: cung zhig bstan par bya ba yang //
T02D1617:148b-5: khyad par bsgrub pa'i don du bshad //
T02D1617:148b-6: chu yis sbyin sreg ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D1617:148b-7: sgrub pa po ni the tshom skyes //
T02D1617:148b-8: med kyang sdig sreg sdig pa sbyong //
T02D1617:148b-9: chu yang de bzhin 'dra bas na //
T02D1617:149a-2: sa gzhi la sogs mtshan ldan par //
T02D1617:149a-3: shin tu yangs shing gru bzhi la //
T02D1617:149a-4: kun du dris byug mandala steng //
T02D1617:149a-5: bla re la sogs rgyan rnams bre //
T02D1617:149a-6: dbus su chu yi snod sogs la //
T02D1617:149a-7: dri ni dkar pos byugs nas ni //
T02D1617:149a-8: bum pa skyon bral yon tan ldan //
T02D1617:149a-9: dbyibs ni gru bzhi'am zlum po la //
T02D1617:149a-10: thab khung lta bu'i dbyibs can de //
T02D1617:149a-11: bcu bzhi kha tshad sum gnyis zabs //
T02D1617:149a-12: chu dang 'o ma bsres pa yi //
T02D1617:149a-13: dri zhim chu yis dgang bar bya //
T02D1617:149a-14: kha ni shing lo sar pas brgyan //
T02D1617:149a-15: yang na bum pa brgyad sogs kyis //
T02D1617:149a-16: gzhung gi don du 'dod par shes ;
T02D1617:149a-17: /'dir ni blo dman don sgrub cig / bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru //
T02D1617:149a-18: skad cig gcig gis bskyed nas kyang //
T02D1617:149a-19: mchod pa la sogs bya ba'o //
T02D1617:149a-20: de nas stong pa'i ngang las kyang //
T02D1617:149a-21: cho ga gsum mam skad cig mas //
T02D1617:149a-22: ye shes mkha' 'gro zhal gsum ni //
T02D1617:149a-23: bzhad dang khro ba sgeg dang bcas //
T02D1617:149a-24: phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug pas mtshan //
T02D1617:149a-25: sems dpa'i skyil krung rgyan gyis klubs //
T02D1617:149a-26: kha dog dkar po'i na bza' gsol //
T02D1617:149a-27: byin rlabs la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02D1617:149a-28: chu skyon la sogs med pa yis //
T02D1617:149a-29: lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su //
T02D1617:149a-30: padma'i tshul du cung zad dbye //
T02D1617:149a-31: aom ka ma la be ha sv'a h'a /
T02D1617:149a-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa yi //
T02D1617:149a-34: padma chu yi nang bkod la //
T02D1617:149a-35: gdugs dkar po yis g-yogs pa yi //
T02D1617:149a-36: sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02D1617:149a-37: rang gi dbus las byung ba yi //
T02D1617:149a-38: sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed //
T02D1617:149a-39: sku mdog la sogs gong dang mthun //
T02D1617:149a-40: sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs bstim //
T02D1617:149a-41: lag gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcings //
T02D1617:149a-42: mdzub mo gnyis ni brkyang nas su //
T02D1617:149a-43: mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bya //
T02D1617:149a-44: dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02D1617:149a-45: aom sa ma ya tishtha h'um phat /
T02D1617:149a-46: dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1617:149a-47: me tog bdug spos dri la sogs //
T02D1617:149a-48: mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya //
T02D1617:149a-49: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D1617:149a-50: g-yon pa snying gar gzhag nas su //
T02D1617:149a-51: g-yas pa steng nas dbub par bya //
T02D1617:149a-52: rtsa ba'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02D1617:149b-0: rtsa ba'i @149b sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1617:149b-1: kunda la sogs rtsa mdog dkar /
T02D1617:149b-2: rtse mor d'ur ba btsugs nas su //
T02D1617:149b-3: lha mo'i dbu steng rdo rje yi //
T02D1617:149b-4: cod pan la ni gtor bar bya //
T02D1617:149b-5: gsang sngags lan re bzlas nas su //
T02D1617:149b-6: lan re skyor bas dbul bar bya //
T02D1617:149b-7: lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni//
T02D1617:149b-9: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar //
T02D1617:149b-10: d'ur ba dang ni ldan pa yi //
T02D1617:149b-11: las ni khri phrag byas pa ni //
T02D1617:149b-12: khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags //
T02D1617:149b-13: n'a ga pushpa'i yam shing ni //
T02D1617:149b-14: 'o mar spangs te dbul bar bya //
T02D1617:149b-15: las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis //
T02D1617:149b-16: grong ni zhi bar byed par 'gyur //
T02D1617:149b-17: padma yi ni yam shing rnams //
T02D1617:149b-18: khri phrag du ni bzlas nas su //
T02D1617:149b-19: las rnams kun la sbyar byas na //
T02D1617:149b-20: yul phyogs zhi bar byed par 'gyur //
T02D1617:149b-21: bri yang ku dang bil ba dang //
T02D1617:149b-22: de bzhin autpala ku ma da //
T02D1617:149b-23: rgyal po las la sogs sbyar na //
T02D1617:149b-25: sngags pas rtag tu skyor chu gtor //
T02D1617:149b-26: brgya rtsa brgyad du gtor byas pas //
T02D1617:149b-27: bye brag tu ni rgyas par 'gyur //
T02D1617:149b-28: bcom ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1617:149b-29: sems dpa'i skyil krung phyag gnyis ldan //
T02D1617:149b-30: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs //
T02D1617:149b-31: phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug to bsnams //
T02D1617:149b-32: kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes //
T02D1617:149b-33: bzhad cing khro la sgeg dang bcas //
T02D1617:149b-34: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol //
T02D1617:149b-36: phrin las bcol par byas nas ni //
T02D1617:149b-37: yi ge brgya pas bshags pa bya //
T02D1617:149b-39: snying gar sbyor ba'i man ngag ni //
T02D1617:149b-41: der 'dus pa'i bla ma la sogs phul bas su //
T02D1617:149b-42: lha rnams mnyes par gyur nas ni //
T02D1617:149b-43: sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02D1617:149b-44: bdag dang slob ma gnyis ka yi //
T02D1617:149b-45: lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa spyod //
T02D1617:149b-46: me dang 'dra bar chu yis kyang //
T02D1617:149b-47: sdig pa 'dag par kho nar gsungs //
T02D1617:149b-48: bdag gis 'di byas dge ba yis //
T02D1617:149b-49: sems can ma lus thams cad kyi //
T02D1617:149b-50: sdug bsngal ma lus byang nas kyang //
T02D1617:149b-51: thams cad byang chub thob par shog / slob dpon bha ba'i man ngag rdzogs so /
T02D1617:150a-0: // / lo ts'a ba tshul khrims gzhon @150a * //
